definitions.definition: The fundamental force of attraction that exists between all matter in the universe , caused by the curvature of spacetime caused by matter. It is the weakest of the four fundamental interactions, and possesses a gauge boson known as the graviton .

main_definition: ( physics ) The fundamental force of attraction that exists between all matter in the universe , caused by the curvature of spacetime caused by matter. It is the weakest of the four fundamental interactions, and possesses a gauge boson known as the graviton .
